labels.label:
Executes the SQL
statement on specified
DB (Postgres) table.

Transforms incoming
JSON into required
JOSN format

Invokes weather API
which returns JSON
response.

Extracts specific
fields of the JSON
response and adds
these extracted fields
as flowfile attributes

SSL context controller
service Requires
Truststore filepath
& password as the
API is HTTPS

Replaces flowfile
content with SQL
statement with fields
extracted from flowfile
attributes
